alert.note: Alert for Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Inland St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 22 at 10:01PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central St. Johns and east central Clay Counties through 1100 PM EST... At 1000 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms capable of producing a landspout along a line extending from near Guana River State Park to near Bostwick. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Saint Augustine, World Golf Village, Saint Augustine Beach, Vilano Beach, Picolata, South Ponte Vedra, Saint Augustine Shores, Butler Beach, Saint Augustine South and Guana River State Park. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Inland St. Johns
